title: Chile launches open-source AI model designed for Latin America
snippet: Chile launches open-source AI model designed for Latin America

title: Nothing Phone 4a, 4a Pro tipped for March launch with bigger batteries and 120Hz displays
snippet: Nothing could unveil the Phone 4a and 4a Pro at MWC 2026 as its main smartphones for the year, teasing new colours, upgraded batteries, Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 chips and refreshed designs, with expected mid range pricing in India and global markets.

title: WhatsApp may soon let you change its colours, icons and overall look: Here's how
snippet: WhatsApp is reportedly testing new Android customisation features, including themed app icons, accent colours and visual tweaks, giving users greater control over the app’s look. The tools, spotted in beta, may arrive in a future update and could be tied to a premium plan.

title: Apple iPhone 17 gets massive price cut: Here’s how to buy it for under  ₹50,000 on Croma
snippet: Croma’s Valentine’s Day sale brings a major price cut on the iPhone 17, dropping the effective cost to  ₹47,742 with exchange bonuses and bank cashback. Here is how to grab the deal.

title: Apple AirPods Pro 3 could see your surroundings with new infrared tech: Here's how
snippet: Apple’s next AirPods Pro could feature infrared sensors to detect surroundings and enhance spatial audio, gesture controls and AI powered features. Leaks also hint at a new H3 chip and health tracking, while pricing may remain similar to the current model.

title: GoBoult expands Mustang lineup with 3 new watches and transparent TWS earbuds, price starts at  ₹1,499
snippet: GoBoult has launched three new smartwatches—Stallion, Racer, and Muscle—along with the Mustang Sprint TWS in India. The Stallion is priced at  ₹3,999, Racer at  ₹2,999, and TWS at  ₹1,499 during the launch period, with pre-orders available on their website.

title: Take down deepfakes within two hours: India’s new IT Rules
snippet: The government has dropped the requirement that would have mandated large, fixed-size watermarks on AI-generated content.

title: PlayStation 6 leak suggests major memory upgrade as Sony eyes next-gen console: What to expect
snippet: A fresh leak suggests Sony’s PlayStation 6 could feature up to 30GB of unified GDDR7 memory and significantly higher bandwidth, promising smoother gameplay and richer worlds

title: AI Impact Summit 2026: From Sam Altman to Sundar Pichai; Check full list of tech leaders coming to Delhi
snippet: The AI Impact Summit will take place in India from February 16-20 and is being positioned as the first global AI summit in the Global South. Major AI industry leaders attending the summit include Sundar Pichai, Sam Altman, Dario Amodei, Jensen Huang, Yann Lecun, Yoshua Bengio, Mukesh Ambani and more

title: India ranks second globally in enterprise AI usage amid rising cyber risks
snippet:
India has emerged as a global powerhouse in artificial intelligence (AI) adoption, ranking second only to the United States in enterprise AI/ML transactions, according to a report by cloud security major Zscaler.
The findings, released in the 'Zscaler ThreatLabz 2026 AI Security Report,' come a week

title: Govt directs platforms to label AI content, deploy checks on misuse
snippet: Platforms must also ensure that AI-generated material is clearly labelled and carries identifiers indicating its synthetic origin

title: India's Sarvam AI reportedly beats ChatGPT, Gemini in key benchmark tests
snippet: Indian AI startup Sarvam AI reports strong benchmark results in document OCR and Indic language understanding, outperforming several global models on layout and multi-script tests

title: Snapchat brings Arrival Notifications option to Snap Map: How to set up
snippet: Snapchat has expanded its Home Safe feature with Arrival Notifications, allowing users to automatically alert friends or family when they reach places like classes, meetings, or travel stops

title: Why multilingual and multimodal AI is central to India's AI 'impact' agenda
snippet: As the India AI Impact Summit nears, initiatives like BharatGen, BHASHINI and Adi Vaani highlight why multilingual and multimodal AI is becoming central to how India is building public digital systems

title: India AI Impact Summit: Govt migrates BHASHINI to Indian cloud platform
snippet: The government has migrated the BHASHINI AI platform to India-based Yotta cloud infrastructure, keeping data, models and GPU workloads within India's jurisdiction

title: What makes India AI Impact Summit different from earlier global AI meetings
snippet: Previous global meetings were shaped by safety concerns, but the India AI summit is framed around real-world impact, deployment and how emerging economies fit into the global AI ecosystem

title: Cloudflare forecasts annual sales above estimates as AI drives cloud demand

title: Govt amends IT rules, with focus on AI content
snippet: The amendments to the IT Act has the potential to cause convulsions in the social media industry, as the new laws slash the timeline to take down flagged unlawful content to three hours, from the existing deadline of 36 hours.

title: AI impact on IT services; Seed-strapping gains traction
snippet: Happy Wednesday! Agentic AI is disrupting the IT services sector’s business model. This and more in today’s ETtech Morning Dispatch.

title: Medical robotics startup Articulus Surgical raises funding from Kalaari Capital
snippet: While the startup did not disclose the amount, it said the capital will be used to accelerate market deployments, expand surgeon training programmes, and deepen partnerships with hospitals over the next 12-18 months.

title: Agentic AI breaking IT’s billing model
snippet: Blended billing rates across global IT services contracts have been on a steady decline over the past 24 months across the US and India for roles such as web and mobile developers, full-stack engineers, remote desktop support, and cyber defence professionals.

title: RBI Innovation Hub boosts its top deck
snippet: The appointments follow Sahil Kini, founder of fintech startup Setu becoming new CEO of the company wholly owned by RBI.
